Title: House of 1000 Bounces
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Mike Benner, Mike Benner (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: The Belcher kids hop into action after news of a bounce house crisis at a birthday party; Bob encounters a guest at the restaurant, fixing him to face a fear.
